body_html: Unfortunately it does not. For depthwise-separable convolutions this https://github.com/szagoruyko/pyinn is much better, and for other grouped convolutions current cudnn version provides only modest improvements.

body: Unfortunately it does not. For depthwise-separable convolutions this https://github.com/szagoruyko/pyinn is much better, and for other grouped convolutions current cudnn version provides only modest improvements.
